name: Kiyr_Gir%27sku
content: Kiyr Gir'sku was a female Bothan noble who was one of the most prominent organic members of the Droid Equality Foundation, a large and powerful droid rights group. A master litigator, Gir'sku took on large court cases on the Foundation's behalf. Gir'sku was unaware that Foundation's true purpose was to bring about the destruction of all droids and Jolor Oron, the leader of the Droid Equality Foundation, viewed her as a tool that he could exploit.
